name: Raise a Demon
description:
In this world demons have a hard life, they cant just go on with their lives,they need to eat human hearts to grow or they die.

Go get some hearts and grow to be the demon you want to be.

It's a simple platform game, but it has a bar called “Containment bar” .

When this bar goes to full, the demon instantly dies because he can't contain his thirst for human hearts so you need to eat hearts to diminish the bar and complete the level.
